items.name: Live Crawfish
items.description: Fresh Louisiana crawfish, caught daily from local bayous. Perfect for boils and traditional Cajun cooking.

items.name: Softshell Crabs
items.description: Premium softshell crabs, cleaned and ready to cook. A Louisiana delicacy at its finest.

items.name: Fresh Catfish Fillets
items.description: Farm-raised catfish fillets, cleaned and ready for frying. Mild flavor and flaky texture.

items.name: Gulf Shrimp
items.description: Wild-caught Gulf shrimp, peeled and deveined. Sweet and succulent from Louisiana waters.

items.name: Blue Crabs
items.description: Live blue crabs from Louisiana coastal waters. Perfect for crab boils and gumbo.

items.name: Fresh Oysters
items.description: Freshly shucked Louisiana oysters, perfect for raw consumption or cooking.
